channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Private
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Private

item.title: CVE-2019-4142|2024-08-04T19:26:28.009Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 2.1.0, 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 158338.

item.title: CVE-2019-4117|2024-08-04T19:26:27.916Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 158116.

item.title: CVE-2019-4119|2024-08-04T19:26:27.962Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private Kubernetes API server 2.1.0, 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 can be used as an HTTP proxy to not only cluster internal but also external target IP addresses. IBM X-Force ID: 158145.

item.title: CVE-2019-4415|2024-08-04T19:33:38.223Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 could allow a local user to obtain elevated privileges due to improper security context constraints. IBM X-Force ID: 162706.

item.title: CVE-2019-4143|2024-08-04T19:26:27.973Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: The IBM Cloud Private Key Management Service (IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2) could allow a local user to obtain sensitive from the KMS plugin container log. IBM X-Force ID: 158348.

item.title: CVE-2019-4116|2024-08-04T19:26:27.926Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 2.1.0, 3.1.0, and 3.1.1 could disclose highly sensitive information in installer logs that could be use for further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 158115.

item.title: CVE-2019-4120|2024-08-04T19:26:27.962Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.1 and 3.1.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158146.

item.title: CVE-2019-4439|2024-08-04T19:33:38.227Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 does not invalidate session after logout which could allow a local user to impersonate another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 162949.

item.title: CVE-2019-4284|2024-08-04T19:33:37.675Z -- ibm -- cloud%20private
item.description: IBM Cloud Private 2.1.0 , 3.1.0, 3.1.1, and 3.1.2 could allow a local privileged user to obtain sensitive OIDC token that is printed to log files, which could be used to log in to the system as another user. IBM X-Force ID: 160512.
